text: Yves Pouliquen (born 17 February 1931) is a French physician. His work has been dedicated to the pathology of the cornea. In 1992, he was made a member of the Académie nationale de médecine. In 1994 he was awarded the Prix mondial Cino Del Duca and on 29 November 2001 he was elected to the Académie française. Since 2006, he is the president of the Fondation Singer-Polignac. ==References== ==Other websites== * L'Académie française * Yves Pouliquen lutte contre la cécité en Afrique – Le Figaro *Publications by Odile Jacob Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:French physicians Category:French academics
title: Yves Pouliquen
